answerText: Atlas Shrugged[10] Atlas Shrugged was written by this female author who created architect Howard Roark in The Fountainhead.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 8 | 7 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  In this novel, the protagonist joins a strike led by John Galt.  [10] Name this novel centering on a Vice President of a railroad company, Dagny Taggart.
